item.title: Creative Video Editor Needed for YouTube/TikTok Shorts - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Weekly Video Editor for YouTube/TikTok Shorts

Job Description:
I'm seeking a reliable video editor to produce engaging YouTube and TikTok shorts on a weekly basis. Your task will be to creatively combine audio clips I provide with visually engaging, copyright-free video content. This includes gameplay from Minecraft, ASMR-style destruction sequences, dynamic driving scenes from GTA, Subway Surfers gameplay, or any similar content that aligns with the tone of the audio.

Responsibilities:

Select and edit video clips that complement the provided audio.
Use a video editor that supports auto-generated captions (e.g., CapCut).
Ensure captions accurately reflect the audio content and are perfectly timed.
Incorporate compelling clickbait titles or comments in the video.
Consistently deliver 7 videos every week at a predetermined time.
Requirements:

Basic proficiency with video editing software, especially those with captioning features.
Good sense of timing and visual appeal to match audio and video content.
Ability to adhere to a weekly delivery schedule.
Entry-level experience in video editing; this task is straightforward and has been previously completed within an hour.
What I Offer:

Consistent weekly work.
Clear instructions and expectations for each task.
Prompt and regular communication.
To Apply:
Please provide a brief overview of your experience with video editing, especially any work involving the synchronization of audio to video. Include a sample of a video you’ve edited, if possible.

This role is ideal for someone looking to earn some extra money on the side. It's a straightforward task that's both easy and quick, offering a fast way to supplement your income each week. If you’re interested in a simple job that provides a steady little boost to your earnings, I’d love to hear from you.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$5.00

Category: Video Editing

item.title: Looking for a Short-Form Video Editor in Harmozi Style - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled short-form video editor to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail and the ability to create engaging content that resonates with our audience. You will be responsible for editing, enhancing, and finalizing video content that is typically under 60 seconds.

Responsibilities:

- Edit and refine raw video footage to create concise and impactful narratives.
- Collaborate with directors and producers to align the final product with the project's vision.
- Utilize advanced editing software to add graphics, animations, and special effects.
- Ensure the final product meets industry standards for quality and consistency.
- Work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Requirements:

- Relevant work experience in post-production with a focus on short-form content.
- Proficiency with video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, and Avid Media Composer.
- An advanced understanding of sound design and special effects.
- Excellent time management skills and the ability to meet project deadlines.
- Strong communication skills for effective collaboration with the production team.

Preferred Skills:

- Experience with 4K video editing and color grading.
- Ability to render and edit videos in 4K quality.
- Familiarity with YouTube's video standards and requirements.

item.title: Creative Video Ad Specialist for 60-Second Funny Ad - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a creative video creator and editor with a knack for humor? We are looking for a talented individual to create a less-than-60-second ad that is not only funny but also has a great hook to grab and retain viewers' attention. If you have a flair for turning basic scripts into engaging and hilarious videos, we want to hear from you!

Responsibilities:

Transform a provided basic script into a funny, engaging, and attention-grabbing video ad.
Ensure the ad is less than 60 seconds in length.
Utilize creative editing techniques to enhance the humor and overall appeal of the ad.
Deliver a final product that stands out and captivates the audience.

Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing and creation, particularly in creating humorous content.
Strong understanding of how to create a compelling hook in the first few seconds of the video.
Proficiency with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Ability to add creative elements and effects to make the video entertaining and unique.
Excellent communication skills to collaborate and refine the provided script.

To Apply:

Please submit your portfolio showcasing previous work that highlights your ability to create funny and engaging video content. Include any relevant experience or success stories where your videos have achieved high engagement.

By focusing on these points, you should be able to attract skilled video editors who can bring a humorous and captivating twist to your project.

Hourly Range: $28.00-$61.00
